attributes.action: Stop india from revoking article 370/35 in Kashmir & conduct plebiscite under UN
attributes.additional_details:
India failed to keep its promise to conduct plebiscite. Indian then PM Nehru wrote to J&K’s PM: “It’s settled policy of Indian Govt that the Constitution of J&K is a matter for determination by the people of the state..” 

As per IoA, if there is a breach of contract, the general rule is that parties are to be restored to the original position.

https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/indianexpress.com/article/explained/understanding-articles-370-35a-jammu-kashmir-indian-constitution-5610996/lite
attributes.background: India’s Hindu Nationalist govt abrogated article 370 from Kashmir illegally & human rights violation is on. In IoA, Lord Mountbatten stated “it is my Govt’s wish that as soon as law &order have been restored in Kashmir.., the question of the State’s accession be settled by a reference to the people”

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269834

There's also a petition calling for the UK to urge India to de-escalate conflict and respect the special status of Kashmir, which you might like to sign and share if it calls for something you'd like to happen.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269094
